mapper.select: select t1.id , t1.fk_report_id , t1.ryname , t1.entname , t1.regno , t1.enttype , t1.regcap , t1.regcapcur , t1.entstatus , t1.subconam , t1.currency , t1.conform , t1.fundedratio , t1.create_time from ext_yszx_shareholder_info t1 where t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update ext_yszx_shareholder_info t1 set t1.fk_report_id =#{dto.fkReportId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, t1.ryname =#{dto.ryname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.entname =#{dto.entname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.regno =#{dto.regno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.enttype =#{dto.enttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.regcap =#{dto.regcap,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.regcapcur =#{dto.regcapcur,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.entstatus =#{dto.entstatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.subconam =#{dto.subconam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.currency =#{dto.currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.conform =#{dto.conform,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, t1.fundedratio =#{dto.fundedratio,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where t1.id = #{dto.id}
mapper.delete: delete from ext_yszx_shareholder_info t1 where t1.ID in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update ext_yszx_shareholder_info t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.id in( ${ids})
